inclusion.criterion: Man or woman between age 18-65 with newly diagnosed Multiple Myeloma for whom stem cell transplantation is considered appropriate
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: European Cooperative Oncology Group performance status 0-3
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum bilirubin < 1.5x the upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum alanine transaminase (ALT)/aspartate transaminase values < 2.5 x ULN
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects (or their legally acceptable representatives) must signed an informed consent document indicating that they understanding the purpose of and procedures required for the study and are willing to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine > 400 Micromol/l after initial resuscitation
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients with previous Grade 2-4 peripheral neuropathy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma, s/p allogeneic transplant with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD.
